phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
I have surpassed the old man...
Our high-flyin' lives are every which way!
When the sun goes down, there is a bon voyage bash.
It are not sad at all.
As long as we are alive, we will meet again somewhere!
Blast straight through a headwind, set off!
Stay strong until the tears dry up!
A man got to be tough.
As proof of our strong, strong bonds!
Now, grab that map to the shining future!
Why was not any of you killed?
After using all that magical power...
All the members of the guild and the people of the city are safe as well.
Not a single person has been killed.
You inherited more than just the master's strength and magical power.
You also got a heart that feels for your friends!
Fairy Law only affects those the caster sees as his enemy.
You understand what this means, right Laxus?
The feelings he has deep down are revealed through his magic.
This is what you really feel.
Everyone who gets in my way is my enemy!
Who gives a crap about that old man?
Not just some old man's grandson!
Do not get so puffed up, you jerk!
Does being Gramps' grandson make you so different from the rest of us?!
Everybody in the guild is in the same family!
And what the hell do you know?
That is why we help each other out!
Disappear off the face of the earth!
I will be the one to stop you!
Even if the guild dies, it will never be yours.
Because it is our home to return to!
Do you honestly think you could beat me?
Breakdown Fist of the Thunder Dragon!
It is 100 years too early for you to be preaching to me, pipsqueak.
I will make sure there is not even a trace left!
If you use that magic while Natsu is like this...
Did he use himself as a lightning rod?
That magic will shatter a dragon's scales, crush its innards,
and cut down its very soul.
I thought coming here or meddling were forbidden!
That child really goes overboard, you know.
I wonder who he takes after?
But his luck will not last him forever.
Do not interfere with the humans!
Do you wish to anger me?
No matter how we may be worried, there is not a thing we can do.
All we can do is believe in the power of the humans.
So Fantasia's been postponed until tomorrow night?
Does their master not feel well?
I wonder who the next master will be?
It sorta makes you think, huh?
I known him since he was a kid.
But we all get older, do not we?
Thanks to Poluchka, it seems his life has been saved for now.
I did not know what was going to happen for a little while there.
That old man is not going to kick the bucket so easily!
But the master is quite old.
Stressing his heart more will only make his health worse.
But are we really doing the Fantasia under these conditions?
It is what the master wants.
It is precisely at times like this that we should do it.
Juvia is also looking forward to seeing the Fantasia!
Is she troubled or happy about it?
Well, we do have a lot of injured people.
The rule is: anyone who can still move has to participate?
Then I guess I will participate too!
Are you happy about it or not?
Looks like those guys cannot participate, though.
I do not want to hear that from you.
I have no idea what you are saying.
I doubt it is anything important.
No way you can participate, trash.
What does that have to do with it?
I wonder how he can understand him?
I seriously doubt it is anything important.
Sometimes your cold-hearted feelings scare me!
But with this, we have fixed one of the problems in the guild.
No matter how much you hang your head, you think we will let you see the master?
He is in the inside clinic.
This time was two against one, so I are not satisfied.
I are not going to lose next time.
I will fight you anytime, Laxus!
I would not call that winning either.
Ever since I was in the war with Phantom, it gives me chills.
Okay, it is time for everyone to get ready for the Fantasia!
Now that I know I am in it, we would better practice!
Do you understand what you have done?
They are a place where friends gather...
They are a place where you can get work...
And to kids with no place to go, they can be a home.
They are not something you can own.
A guild is the confidence and good will of each individual,
and from them the tough bonds that are formed.
You went against that good will and threatened the lives of your fellow members.
This is not something that can be forgiven.
Try relaxing a little, would you?
If you do that, maybe you would see things you cannot right now.
You would hear words that you cannot hear now.
Raising you was like a new lease on life for me.
You do not have to be smart.
That is all I ever wanted for you...
You have got to be kidding me!
Why are you the only one that is expelled?
Are not we just as guilty?
It is what the old man decided.
What a pain you guys are.
Why are you trying to take all the responsibility on yourself?
Unlike you, I do not have any attachments left to the guild.
I am sure Natsu and Gray will be against your expulsion!
No matter what they say, they...
What will happen to the Raijin Tribe?
We will see each other again.
He thought he was using you, but in fact he was being used himself.
For 8 years, he never noticed I was pretending to be the spirit of Zeref...
Your brainwashing made the plan work perfectly.
The upheaval in the Council and the firing of Etherion...
While Jellal was on his rampage, you could move as you pleased.
Thanks to that, we have obtained one of the keys needed to unlock the seal.
You are not going to join in?
Oh yeah, Mr. Shooby doo Bop?
I found out where he is.
Sorry about giving you such a dangerous job.
Eh, do not worry about it.
He has no idea I am a double agent.
I cannot let him do as he pleases.
That is too fancy for him...
It is more funky than fancy...
Gramps, are not you going to participate in the Fantasia this time?
I will be watching from the stands.
I wonder if I will be able to see where you are...
Then, in the middle of the parade...
It means that even if I cannot see where you are, I am always looking at you, Gramps!
Even if I cannot see you...
Even if we are separated far apart...
I will always be watching you.
I will watch over you forever.
There is way more to go!
I am still just a rookie...
But I have got to work hard and become a wizard that will not lose to anyone!
Lucy, they say smiling weird like that will give you wrinkles.
I do not want to hear that from you!
And wait, we finally had a nice moment there...
And this is how they end it?
That time we laughed, saying we are both like each other,
we even kindly overlooked the little lies.
If we lose a place to go back to together, I do not care.
Because I will protect that smile.
The meetings and partings numerous as the stars in the sky...
All the things I do not want to lose...
Right now I feel like I do not need any of them.
I just want to see you by my side,
Let us do it like we have just been reborn.
Like flowers blown in a summer wind,
let us bloom brightly in this instant.
Natsu, I heard that a reporter from the Weekly Sorcerer is going to come interview Fairy Tail!
You mean that magazine that is always printin' bad stuff about me?
Actually, I think it was all the truth...
But anyway, do not hurt them, no matter what, got it?
Next time: The Day of Fated Meeting
I would not get your hopes up, Natsu.
